summary.heading: Summary
summary.description: Software engineer focused in web development with 2+ years of expertise in JavaScript and React. Passionate about solving problems with pragmatic and maintainable solutions. Highly team-oriented and driven to be a high impact team member.

details.title: Software Engineer II
descriptions: Spearheaded a cross project refactor to standardize visual elements and maintain visual integrity accross multiple browsers and devices
Added new expermental feature for integrated automation feature testing with Nightwatch and Selenium
Fulfilled support developer duties including being scrum master for stand up and actively responding to cross-team engineering support channels

Fixed bugs, created new features according to product specifications and completed spikes to pioneer new solutions around automation for Microsoft Edge and viewport scaling with a new Closed Captions feature

details.title: Software Engineer
descriptions: Lead and managed small team on a project for a custom slackbot to perform HR duties
Designed how the slackbot interacts with Slack, Google, and Paymo APIs to automate requests
Reverse engineered a financial application (Java + PHP) and converted to modern JavaScript
Created interview questions and participated in the hiring process for junior developers

details.title: Software Engineer
descriptions: Made a resume generating application that takes JSON and converts into a preformatted PDF
Reviewed code and built out features for how the application reads JSON

details.title: Software Engineer Consultant
descriptions: Established a system to organize CSS files for streamlined development
Executed refactoring recommendations to improve site performance
Guided onboarding developers through environment setup
Full time 500+ hour web development immersive program
Developed four full stack web applications using JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and Ruby
